means: dishearten（使泄气）的现在分词形式

sentence.Network_en: It was a disheartening circumstance, but a melancholy fact.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是一个令人懊丧的情况, 但是一个悲惨的事实.

sentence.Network_en: We propose the light to throw on this disheartening tragedy.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们对这桩令人沮丧的悲剧提出我们的说明.

sentence.Network_en: Many of the early attempts at machine translation were therefore disheartening failures.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多机器翻译的早期尝试都令人泄气地失败了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 冰与火之歌单词 - 豆丁网 ... prev 1-10 of 87 next disgusting 令人厌恶的 disheartening 使人沮丧的动词 dishes 餐具，碗盘.
Many of the early attempts at machine translation were disheartening failures ., 许多机器翻译的早期尝试都令人泄气地失败了.
be oppressive or disheartening to ., 使沉重或者使人沮丧.
The red lines on my card were demeaning , disheartening , and most discouraging ., 在我的成绩单上的红色线被贬低 , 令人痛心 , 最令人沮丧.

list.abs: I get really disheartened because I still cannot speak English well ., 我真灰心因为我还是说不好英语.
The disheartened instructor tried vainly to arouse their interest ., 沮丧的教师试图激起他们的兴趣 , 但却是徒劳.
those young men are too easily disheartened by difficulties ., 那些年青人遇到困难时太容易泄气了.
He was not disheartened , and he continued with his researches ., 他没有失去信心 , 仍然继续自己的研究.

entry.tran: 令人灰心的;令人气馁的
entry.def: If something is disheartening, it makes you feel disappointed and less confident or less hopeful.

auth_sentence.content: Seeing this stuff all over the place is disheartening.
auth_sentence.res_content: Seeing this stuff all over the place is disheartening.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Seeing this stuff all over the place is disheartening.

auth_sentence.content: Today, the political and fiscal situations seem more disheartening.
auth_sentence.res_content: Today, the political and fiscal situations seem more disheartening.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Today, the political and fiscal situations seem more disheartening.

auth_sentence.content: It is incredibly disheartening and such a waste of talent.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is incredibly disheartening and such a waste of talent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is incredibly disheartening and such a waste of talent.
